Package ServerClient

Class BertSemanticGraderModel

java.lang.Object
ServerClient.BertSemanticGraderModel
public class BertSemanticGraderModel extends Object
A BERT Model Version using the Deep Java Library Bi-directional Encoders for Transformers (BERT) Wrapper. This model uses the DistilBERT version of the greater BERT model, a lighter, faster model with less parameters. We are using BERT's built in tokenizer to convert the input strings into numerical tokens that capture a feature of the text. There are two private data classes contained within this model as overrides in order to specialize the BERT model for classification and similarity calculations. Adapted from DLJ Examples.
Version:
1.0.2
Author:
Kamran Hussain

  • Constructor Details

    • BertSemanticGraderModel

      public BertSemanticGraderModel​(boolean createNewModel)
      Creates a new DLJ BERT model object and builds the necessary engines and support frameworks. Automatically calls the buildModel method to load an existing model into memory.
      Parameters:
      createNewModel - boolean representing whether to create model

  • Method Details

    • buildModel

      public void buildModel() throws ai.djl.repository.zoo.ModelNotFoundException, ai.djl.MalformedModelException, IOException, ai.djl.translate.TranslateException
      Procedural code for building and loading the model then creating the necessary datasets.
      Throws:
      ai.djl.repository.zoo.ModelNotFoundException - If the BERT model cannot be located from a save or downloaded from the hugging face hub or DeeJavaLibrary
      ai.djl.MalformedModelException - If the model is loaded improperly or missing some weights/dependencies.
      IOException - If dependencies cannot be found or properly loaded.
      ai.djl.translate.TranslateException - If an error occurs when setting the weights of the model.

    • loadModel

      public void loadModel() throws IOException
      Loads the pretrained model from a file save and starts the model entry point server
      Throws:
      IOException - If the model directory or server resources cannot be loaded or found.

    • predict

      public String predict​(String document, String rubricCategory)
      Predicts the similarity between the inputted and outputted documents.
      Parameters:
      document - The Student essay or other document as a String.
      rubricCategory - The rubric category phrase to test the students essay against.
      Returns:
      A string detailing the semantic relatedness of the two inputs, corresponding, contradiction, or neutral for gibberish

    • loadAndTrainModel

      public final void loadAndTrainModel​(int epoch, int batchSize, int maxTokenLength, String trainFile, String testFile) throws ai.djl.repository.zoo.ModelNotFoundException, ai.djl.MalformedModelException, IOException, ai.djl.translate.TranslateException
      Loads and trains the model from a single method
      Parameters:
      epoch - Number of training epochs to execute
      batchSize - Batch size for optimized training on hardware
      maxTokenLength - Maximum token size length
      Throws:
      ai.djl.repository.zoo.ModelNotFoundException - If there is an issue building the model
      ai.djl.MalformedModelException - If there is an issue building the model or initializing weights
      IOException - If the model or dependencies cannot be found
      ai.djl.translate.TranslateException - If the model cannot be inferenced or trained
